page.title: 20"COSTA GERIATRICA"?
page.content: Bexhill is often jokingly referred to as{"Costa Geriatrica"}because of it's predominantly older population. Such a balance could cause{problems}in the longer term, if means to cope with a growing number of pensioners nationally, over-stretches resources. {Bexhill,}however, is now trying to attract{new, younger families}with well designed housing at competative prices.{It must also provide new jobs. The old may prefer the slower pace here and fewer students in the summer, but the town has social activities to suit most tastes.{It's future}belongs to many of the{children and teenagers from 3 primary and 2 private schools, (aged between 6 and 16) who compiled this report on their area. It was programmed in by{Mrs. Perry and the {children of St. Mary Magdalene's {School. July 1985.
